definitions.definition: The unsaturated macrocyclic ketone 1-cycloheptadec-9-enone that is a pheromone produced by the civet cat , and is used to add a musky tone to perfumes

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) The unsaturated macrocyclic ketone 1-cycloheptadec-9-enone that is a pheromone produced by the civet cat , and is used to add a musky tone to perfumes
